divs: Sighting Detailsmy 2 sissters went 2 the store on the way back we all herd them screaming me and my 2 bothers and mother went out side to see what was going on they were screaming and pointing back at us we all looked up over the house not more than 40 feet in the air was a flying object stationary at the time my sissters keep screaming it started to move slowly away i then ran throw the house to the back door look an saw it disaper with only one red slowly polsating lihgt the thing is tha all together my famaly has seen5 ufo sighting in my life we have missing time experece and i have had phsical evedence
Summary: It was over the house all family seen it.
trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Mobile
There were no other sightings in Mobile on or around May 5th 1972
